name: Phozzle Photo Puzzle
description:
Phozzle is a photo-puzzle quiz game.

The object of the game is to solve a word puzzle by clicking on the correct photo. Puzzles consist of one or more words represented by mostly blank spaces, and sometimes a few letters filled in. By analyzing the number of letters in the puzzle and whatever given letters are displayed, the player must figure out which of the four photos matches the puzzle.

The Hint button can be used to reveal additional letters.

Points are earned for each correct answer based on a number of factors including the level, difficulty settings (Easy, Medium, and Hard), how many hints were used, and how quickly the puzzle was solved.

When the timer is enabled, the player must complete each puzzle in 15 seconds or less.
